SRM
Class Direction

java.lang.Object
  SRM.Direction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Direction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

The Direction abstract contains a three element vector and a reference location.

See Also:
BaseSRF_3D
